description: Tyler Brooks is no stranger to the Boynapped Penthouse. In fact, this kinky lad works as Sebastian's house-boi and general helper around the house! Sebastian decides to keep his fit house guest Luke Desmond entertained by roping Tyler to the workman's stands and beating cum from him. Sebastian and Luke kill an hour or two edging Tyler and spanking him with a wooden spoon until he can't hold back a second longer. You'll love how much cum Tyler gives up - three massive streams that shoot over a meter before splattering over the penthouse floor. A hot scene for all the cum lovers!
title: Luke Desmond, Sebastian Kane & Tyler Brooks
